name: Desert Stalker 0.11a
description:
Pixeldrain and Android files are uploading...

0.11a Changelog:

New Content:
- Added 6 scenes:
  - Ivy's hideout
  - Kateryna's house visit
  - Continuation of Shani's quest in the Zone
  - Raiders/Kitty
  - Zahra on the terrace
  - Harem scene (Ain/Zahra)

- Added 2 small events:
  - A short revisit to pregnant Hive Queen (will be repeatable in the future
  - Zahra sleeping scene variation

Minor changes / Fixes:
- Various text errors and typos
- Fixed a flag error in Shani's new quest

Technical:
- Updated engine to RenPy 7.5.3

Note: The newest version of RenPy dropped 32-bit OS support. If you fail to launch the game let us know.
